function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in global and local supply chains","Impact":"Disruption of goods and services delivery","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced technologies and diversifying logistics schemes","Technologies":"Advanced technologies for supply chain management","People":"Supply chain stakeholders","Owner":"Supply chain management teams"},{"Description":"Volatile economic situations affecting manufacturing and logistics sectors","Impact":"Pressing need to improve current operations","Mitigation":"Implementing advanced technologies and diversifying logistics schemes","Technologies":"Advanced technologies for supply chain management","People":"Manufacturing and logistics sector employees","Owner":"Management teams in the manufacturing and logistics sectors"},{"Description":"Impact of disruptions on focal organization in supply chain","Impact":"Dependence on features such as proximity, type, speed, and duration of disruption","Mitigation":"Identifying alternative paths and reducing impact through diversification","Technologies":"Supply chain management and diversification strategies","People":"Supply chain management teams","Owner":"Supply chain management teams"}]}
